text: The Embraer Legacy 600 Is a private Jet aircraft. It was manufactured by Embraer. It began being produced by Embraer in 2002 and so continues today. It is based on the E135 model, and some are upgraded with a cockpit from a Embraer 145. It was released in 2000 at the Farnborough Airshow, the Legacy can take 13 passengers and up to 3,050 nautical miles. Embraer later had launched a lineup of business aircraft, from the small Embraer Phenom 100 to the Embraer Lineage 1000, Which is a long range Business jet of the Embraer's E190 which is apart of the Embraer E-Jet family. The legacy 600 is one of the most popular aircraft to charter in its class. Embraer Legacy 600 Production: 2002- Current Introduction: 2002 First flight: 2000 Category:Embraer
title: Embraer Legacy 600
